attributes.action: Make wearing bicycle helmets mandatory for all users on a UK road.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish for it to be made mandatory that bicycle users are to wear helmets when ever on a UK road.

too many these days don't and being both a car driver and a cyclist i find it very annoying that cyclists feel like they own the road, but can be easily knocked from their bike.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
